message.raw: Changed some datatypes of RFblaster tables, such that bigger integers are allowed, to allow for longer wait times. The RFblaster is capable of quite long wait times by looping wait instructions, so it's pointless to limit the wait time to 2**31 * 13.33ns prior to those loops being constructed.
